name: Professor Oak
text: Discard your hand, then draw 7 cards.

effect.text: Discard your hand, then draw 7 cards.

strengths: One of the best draw cards ever printed
weaknesses: Loses cards you may have wanted
synergies: Play out hand first, then Oak
counters: Lass - Shuffle away the new hand's Trainers

competitiveHistory: Professor Oak was the most powerful draw card in the early metagame and was included in virtually every competitive deck as a 4-of.

rulings.ruling: You must discard your entire hand before drawing.
If you have fewer than 7 cards in your deck, you draw what remains.
